summary: This book provides an updated overview of enzyme technology, including new chapters on enzyme discovery, protein engineering, and metabolic engineering, making it a comprehensive resource for students and professionals in biotechnology.
key_claims: The second edition includes new chapters on enzyme discovery, protein engineering, and metabolic engineering.
It covers all aspects of enzyme technology, both current and future applications.

immobilization.name: immobilization methods
immobilization.context: still relevant for large-volume chemical products
